description: This course provides students with an opportunity to develop an in-depth understanding of the principles of strength training and conditioning, including anatomical and physiological considerations, lifting techniques, equipment selection, program development/evaluation, and weightlifting safety; thus enabling them to teach and train others. Prerequisites: kinesiology major, BIO 143, and BIO 243.
name: Prin of Strength & Fitness Training
notes: Open only to rising juniors and seniors.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: kinesiology major, BIO 143, and BIO 243.
title: Principles of Strength and Fitness Training
